title: Video: Perfume Genius – Hood
content:
With his sophomore record release just around the corner, Perfume Genius has unveiled a slightly bizarre but hugely sensual video featuring new track Hood.

More upbeat than previous work, the track is one of longing and lust, playing to Hadreas’s vocal strengths. The video is a statement of sorts, questioning the moral compass of society when it comes to same sex relationships, showing Hadreas in ‘romantic’ positions with another male (gay port star Arpad Miklos). As he himself excellently summarized in a recent interview with Pitchfork, “If I just got my boyfriend to be in there with me, people could just pass it off as cute because we’re both boyish. I like the idea of not having things be so obvious.” In an age when it appears that almost anything goes with regards to heterosexual music videos (see Rihanna’s x-rated romps), it’s refreshing to witness an artist challenging these out-dated traditions.
